summary.purpose: Implements an international phone number input component with country flag selector, built on top of react-phone-number-input.
summary.problem_solved: Provides a phone number input with international dialing code support, country flag dropdown, automatic phone number formatting, optional controlled/uncontrolled value modes, Enter key handler, auto-focus capability, and integration with the ModularForm label system.

external.name: react
external.usage: forwardRef, useEffect, useMemo, useRef, useState for component state, refs, and forwarding

external.name: react-phone-number-input
external.usage: Core phone input component (RPNInput.default), Country type, FlagProps type, getCountryCallingCode, and flags for country flag SVGs

external.name: lucide-react
external.usage: ChevronDown icon for country selector dropdown indicator, Phone icon as fallback when no flag is available

exports.name: InternationalPhonePicker
exports.description: An international phone number input component with country flag selector, automatic formatting, and ModularForm-compatible label rendering.

symbols.name: InternationalPhonePicker
symbols.signature: ({ setPhoneValue, phoneValue, placeholder, className, containerClassName, defaultCountry, flagContainerClassName, inputClassName, defaultValue, name, style, onEnter, labelContent, labelClassName, required, direction, defaultFocus, labelsCommonClassName, elementsCommonClassName, minLength, countries, disabled }: InternationalInputProps) => JSX.Element
symbols.description: Main international phone picker component. Supports both controlled mode (via setPhoneValue/phoneValue props) and uncontrolled mode (via internal tempPhoneValue state with hidden input for form submission). Defaults to Israel (IL) country code. Merges user-provided countries with a default set (US, IL, NG, TH). Renders an optional label via ElementLabel when labelContent is provided. Auto-focuses the phone input by default. Stores the phone value in a hidden input element for form submission.

details.rendered_ui_description: An optional label followed by a phone input row containing a country flag dropdown selector on the left (with chevron indicator) and a text input field on the right for entering the phone number. The input has a rounded border with shadow styling and always renders left-to-right.

symbols.name: PhoneInput
symbols.signature: forwardRef<HTMLInputElement, React.ComponentProps<'input'> & { defaultFocus: boolean; disabled: boolean }>((props, ref) => JSX.Element)
symbols.description: A forwardRef wrapper around the shared Input UI component used as the text input for phone number entry. Handles auto-focus on mount when defaultFocus is true. Manages dual ref (internal inputRef for focus and forwarded ref for react-phone-number-input).

details.rendered_ui_description: A styled text input field with left border removed (rounded on the right side only) to visually attach to the country selector. Gains focus automatically by default on mount.

symbols.name: CountrySelect
symbols.signature: ({ disabled, value, onChange, options, className }: CountrySelectProps) => JSX.Element
symbols.description: A custom country selector component for the phone input. Renders a styled container with the current country flag and a chevron down icon, overlaid with a transparent native HTML select element for accessibility and mobile compatibility. Filters out options without a country value and displays country name with calling code.

details.rendered_ui_description: A rounded left-side button showing the selected country flag and a small down chevron icon. An invisible native select element overlays the button for actual interaction, ensuring accessibility and native mobile picker support.

symbols.name: FlagComponent
symbols.description: Renders the SVG flag for a given country code from the react-phone-number-input flags package. Falls back to a Phone icon from lucide-react when no flag is available for the country.

details.rendered_ui_description: A small (20px wide) rounded flag image, or a phone icon fallback if the country flag is unavailable.
